content:
## EXISTING STRUCTURES

### Stone furnace setup at position(x)
Consists of the following entities:
- Stone furnace (position x1)
- Stone furnace (position x2)

### Coal and Iron Ore Processing
Consists of the following entities:
- Inserter (position y1) that inserts iron ore into the first stone furnace
- Inserter (position y2) that inserts iron ore into the second stone furnace
- Inserter (position z1) that inserts coal into the second stone furnace
- Inserter (position z2) that inserts coal into the first stone furnace

## ERROR TIPS

### Errors when using extracting but being too far
- Make sure to move to the target entity where you want to extract from before extracting items.

### Errors when placing into a tile which is occupied by another entity
- Ensure you can place an entity to a tile before attempting placing.

### Errors related to inventory updates
- Regularly check your inventory to ensure you are aware of the current resources available for processing.
